vars.MAX_ALLOWED_TEMPERATURE: Max temperature allowed, used for BMP280 stability checks
vars.MIN_ALLOWED_PRESSURE: Min allowed pressure, used for BMP280 stability checks
vars.MAX_BMP_RESET_ATTEMPTS: Max attempts of resetting the BMP280 when values are wrong that the IWS tryes before HOLD state, default 5
vars.ApproxAltitude: Approx altitude var from BMP.readAltitude() func, in metres (m)
vars.RainLevel: Rain level var, 0 if false, 50~973 true, 974~1023 something conductive on the sensor
vars.BMPaddr: BMP280 logic address, 0x76 by default, HEX
vars.BMPlastStatus: Last status of BMP, used for IWSmessage formatting
vars.mac: MAC address of the W5100 Ethernet Shield
vars.ip: local IP address of the IWS
vars.server: local port for communications, 80 HTTP by default
vars.EthernetCS: Ethernet Shield local chip select pin, 10 by default

funcs.checkHW(): Checks Hardware status and puts the IWS in HOLD state if there are issues
funcs.takeMeasurements(): Takes measurements and save the outs in the respective vars
funcs.holdAndWait(): Puts the IWS in HOLD state, to reset it you must restart the IWS
funcs.updateDaysPassed(): Saves in the 'daysPassed' var how much days passed from last reset, useful to withstand millis() max value of 49.7 days
